author: Gremer
title: 5004081 Plastic Man Review
review:
My Plas figure just came in the mail, and I have to say that it is an absolutely phenomenal figure.

Box/Instructions

Plas comes in a polybag, just like most other promotional figures. You can see his side leg printing, which I believe is a first for DC Superheroes.

Parts

4 parts.  The hair is the same as Superman, the head depicts sunglasses and a grin, the body has both front and back printing, and the legs have side leg printing, which, like I said, I believe is a first for DC minifigs.

Minifigures

Or, in this case, minifigure. Plastic Man is absolutely phenomenal when put together. There's a lot of detail, but it's the right amount. He has the same amount of poseability as all other LEGO minifigs.

The build

Snap the 4 parts together, ta-da!

The completed model

See "Minifigures".

Overall opinion

I highly recommend this figure to anyone who is a DC fan. It's an absolutely phenomenal figure with a perfect amount of detail, unlike other recent figures (for example, Luke Skywalker from the Sandcrawler, Cantina, or 2014 Advent Calendar). He fits in perfectly next to other DC figs, like Flash or Aquaman. If you can get him for $15 or less, it's a steal.
